title: Expedition to Mystery Mountain: Adventures of a Bushwhacking, Knickerbocker-wearing Woman
description: What’s it really like to be an intrepid explorer… and a woman?Expedition to Mystery Mountain is a come-along adventure of a modern woman who retraces the early exploits, made nearly 100 years ago, by fearless trailblazer and pioneering mountaineer, Phyllis Munday. The overly ambitious mission; to climb Mount Waddington, the highest peak in the pacific northwest, in vintage hobnail boots, with a fifty-pound wooden packframe and only an antique ice axe for safety. Can she endure the hordes of mosquitos, the bears, the Devil’s Club and the other dangers on the List of Doom?
author: Susanna Oreskovic
